cmp: 分 (to divide/minute/(a measure word)/(a unit of length = 0.33 centimeter), part)

exm.mng: one after another, in succession, one by one, continuously, diverse, in profusion, numerous and confused, pell-mell
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
brilliant and varied, (often in the combination 精彩纷呈)
to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc), to flutter about
